attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Biggs, "Great Train Robber" is 79 years old and currently in hopital with pneumonia from Norwich Prison.  He should be released on compassionate grounds given his age and ill health

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
